data.Name: Club
data.Description: When all else fails, smacking them with *something* is better than nothing

data.Name: Greatclub
data.Description: An even *bigger* stick .That should do it.

data.Name: Spear
data.Description: The ancient companion of warrior and hunter alike

data.Name: Greatsword
data.Description: When success is measured in length of metal, a greatsword does the job!

data.Name: Leather Armor
data.Description: Comfortable leather padding. Won't stop anything too sharp, but at least it's comfortable to move in

data.Name: Chain Shirt
data.Description: Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest Protection to the wearer's upper body.
